statements: SELECT * FROM player_interactions;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, interaction_details->>'item' FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(interaction_timestamp) AS latest_interaction FROM player_interactions;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM player_interactions ORDER BY interaction_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 12345 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, COUNT(*) FROM player_interactions GROUP BY player_id, interaction_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT player_id, interaction_timestamp FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'login' AND interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp;
SELECT player_id, MAX(interaction_timestamp) AS latest_interaction FROM player_interactions GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY latest_interaction DESC;

SELECT player_id, interaction_type, jsonb_array_elements_text(interaction_details->'achievements') AS achievement_name FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id IN (54321, 67890) ORDER BY player_id, achievement_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_name, last_login FROM players ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'login' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT player_name, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM players JOIN player_interactions ON players.player_id = player_interactions.player_id;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT player_name, player_level, last_login FROM players WHERE player_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT player_name, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM players p JOIN player_interactions pi ON p.player_id = pi.player_id WHERE p.player_level > 5;
SELECT p.player_name, pi.interaction_type, pi.interaction_time FROM players p JOIN player_interactions pi ON p.player_id = pi.player_id WHERE pi.interaction_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PlayerInteractions;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type FROM PlayerInteractions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM PlayerBehaviors WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, game_result, score FROM GameRecords WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY game_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT game_id, player_id, game_result FROM GameRecords WHERE game_result = 'Win'
SELECT * FROM PlayerInteractions WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) FROM PlayerInteractions GROUP BY interaction_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT game_id, player_id, game_result FROM GameRecords WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY game_timestamp ASC;
SELECT player_id, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM PlayerBehaviors WHERE behavior_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM GameRecords WHERE game_result = 'Win' AND score >= 500 ORDER BY score DESC, game_timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT player_name, level, experience FROM player_data;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE item_category = 'weapons';
SELECT player_id, log_timestamp, action FROM game_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, notification_enabled, music_enabled FROM player_preferences WHERE sound_effects_enabled = true;
SELECT player_name, level, gold FROM player_data WHERE level > 50 ORDER BY gold DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, level FROM player_data
SELECT player_id, last_login, gold FROM player_data ORDER BY last_login DESC
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM purchase_history WHERE item_category = 'Weapons'
SELECT player_id, action, location, result FROM game_logs WHERE location = 'Castle' ORDER BY log_timestamp LIMIT 10
SELECT player_id, notification_enabled, sound_effects_enabled, music_enabled FROM player_preferences
SELECT * FROM player_data;
SELECT player_name, level FROM player_data WHERE level > 5 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM player_data WHERE score BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY score ASC;
SELECT player_name, level, score FROM player_data WHERE level < 3 AND score > 500 ORDER BY player_name ASC, score DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_sessions WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY session_duration DESC;
SELECT player_name, level, score FROM player_data WHERE level > 5 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, level, score FROM player_data WHERE level BETWEEN 3 AND 8 ORDER BY level ASC, score DESC;
SELECT player_name, level, score FROM player_data WHERE score >= 1000 AND level < 10 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, level, score FROM player_data WHERE level = 5 OR level = 10 ORDER BY player_name DESC, score ASC;
SELECT player_name, level, score FROM player_data WHERE score < 500 OR score > 2000 ORDER BY level DESC
